resources.string: The Liquorade app is an on-the-go guide for anyone who loves a good cocktail. In the app you can find a large collection of cocktails sorted by their main ingredient, but you can also let the app decide what you\'re going to drink. The Liquorade app uses data from the TheCocktailDB (www.thecocktaildb.com) database.
Choose the main ingredient of your cocktail
